description:
Kana Sakuragi is an excellent candidate for the job. Any job! She’s motivated and organized, and has a fantastic memory. So why has she interviewed at over 15 companies without receiving a single offer? She’s trying to keep a positive attitude, but it seems like her bad luck is only getting worse when a monster crashes her latest interview. As havoc ensues, she finds herself helping the magical girl who comes to their rescue and ends up with more than just her life in return. Meet the newest magical girl at Magilumiere Magical Girls Inc.!

(Source: VIZ Media)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/makoto_myzk) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/宮崎誠)

A music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sunma47) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/三間雅文)

One of the industry's most prolific sound directors, having worked on more than 300 productions.

After having graduated college, Mima joined Magic Capsule, a sound production company ran by his relative [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062/). In 1986, he debuted as a sound director on [MD Geist](https://anilist.co/anime/1285/MD-Geist/). He left Magic Capsule in 1996, and later joined Techno Sound. In 2004, he became the studio's representative director.
Formerly affiliated with Kyoto Animation, presently affiliated with Studio MOE. Currently working also as CG Artist.

__[Website](http://uni-mafumafu.jp/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/uni-mafumafu) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/uni_mafumafu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOTR1tcOAhjgi6YukrPpZxg) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/uni_mafumafu)__

__Introduction:__
Mafumafu, alternatively known as Kagami Mite Shisshin-P, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, vocaloid producer, and audio engineer. He is better known as a utaite with a middle-high range voice.

__Biography:__
As a utaite he likes to add effects to his voice and scream loudly in his covers. He has a very wide vocal range and a versatile voice, having the ability to hit and leap into high notes effortlessly, sometimes to feminine range, without sounding strained or loosing the softness in his voice. However, he also sounds pleasant when he sings songs in his regular and lower voice, which can sound relaxing and quite soothing. On some of his covers, many people are often confused and argue about his gender when he utilizes his higher register, therefore making him a ryouserui. Because of his high vocal range, he is also capable of producing a very convincing female voice, most clearly seen in his cover of Matryoshka. He often makes use of his wide range in his covers by leaping into higher or lower octaves to match the tone of the song.

Occasionally he forgets some of the lyrics and either mumbles or makes cute noises until the next line. His songs are often tagged as someone with a "kakuseirui", also known as an energizing voice.

__Residency:__ Tochigi Prefecture, Japan

__[Website](https://syudou.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tikandame) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/syudou279/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCraC7460yGQF4GDmSjCecpQ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/43XkWaoCS0wKjuMJrWFgoa?si=JYgIMOSJQU-fOXHkUkT8sg)__

__Introduction:__
__syudou__ is a VOCALOID producer who varies in music styles often. He almost exclusively uses [Hatsune Miku](https://anilist.co/staff/110205/Miku-Hatsune) and has many self covers.

__Biography:__
He started listening to music under the influence of his family and began his musical career in 2012.
In January 2018, he released many hits including the songs "Jama", "Bitter Choco Decoration", and "Call Boy".
A year later, he released his first VOCALOID album called "Saiaku". While releasing self-cover of his songs, his next VOCALOID album, "Hisshi" came out in November 2020.

In October 2020, he provided music and lyrics for the song "Ussewa" to [Ado](https://anilist.co/staff/244242), which was a big hit and reached No. 1 on various charts.

In March 2021, he started his career as a singer-songwriter with the release of "Hebereke Junkie".

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/DublandoCoisas) | [Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/dublandocoisas) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/DublandoCoisas)

Lucas Almeida is a Brazilian actor, director and voice actor. He is married to [Mayara Stefane](https://anilist.co/staff/197179/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Den_Leguizamo) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/d.leguizamo/)

A Mexican voice actress. She is the sister of [Elliot Leguizamo](https://anilist.co/staff/194029/Elliot-Leguizamo).
